name: Corrina McKinney
text:
My son and I stopped in for a quick lunch and that's exactly what we received.
The greeter was excellent and he made sure we had everything we needed for our lunch. ‚Ä¶More

name: Shamir Patel
text: Great pizza and calzones. I like the texture of the dough they use.  If you order the pretzel bites, order 2. The table will eat them quick because of the beer cheese sauce. It gets crowded since its very close to KSU and residences.

name: Michele McFarlane
text: So, this has become a go-to spot for my family during the time of COVID.  They have outdoor seating, great service and delicious food. Love. Love. Love.

name: Lindsey Crooks
text: Our lunch was delicious and our server, Josh, was amazing! Loved the new artwork and decor too. We'll definitely be back üòä

name: Dave Wills
text: Delicious food! Quite yummy even! Good helpful service too. Katie and Kayla are awesome!!!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Cheryl Wade
text:
I loved the atmosphere here! The service was great. Our order came out fresh and hot. I asked for extra tomatoes. They brought them straight out. I wasn't even charged extra. The only negative was my husband's calzone wasn't filled well, and the white cheese looked runny. Other wise it was good. Four stars.
GA residents

name: Russell Allen
text: One of the best Mellows I've ever visited. Morgan at the bar was awesome.

name: Lillian Valdez
text: Great service, wonderful employees.   And the food, fresh and delicious.  Nice outdoor area üëç too.

name: Kathy DeOliveira
text: This is our favorite local pizza. They have a great gluten free crust pizza and lots of veggie options. I love that they have tempeh, tofu and dairy free cheese! The food is always good and if it hasn't been, I've spoken with the manager and they have corrected it. Great Spot for Pizza!

name: Cody Rhea
text: Pizza is always great. They were on time with the order, and everyone was extremely helpful and friendly.

name: Dan G
text: Quiet neighborhood restaurant that offers great food n good sports viewing.

name: Kindra Howard
text: I am usually very happy with Mellow Mushroom even though it‚Äôs a chain, but my last experience there was a little sub par. I ordered a BBQ chicken pizza and when it came out I actually called the server over I ask where was the chicken. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Pat Megan
text: Great service, smallest MM we've ever been in. Soup & pizza good as always.

name: Ryan Thompson
text: Some of the best pizza you will ever have plus the crust is whole wheat.

name: Beth Adams
text: The service was prompt and polite. The food was hot and amazing! A bit pricey though

name: Wayne G. Snodgrass III
text: The best Mellow Mushroom pizza I've ever had and possibly the best pizza I've ever had

name: Dina Celentano
text: We used to go to this location frequently.  We ordered takeout tonight and it was beyond disappointing.  We ordered our traditional pizza with meatball(which they charge double).  There was not enough cheese and too much sauce.  I could literally count how many meatballs were on it.

name: Shaun Dodgins
text: Good pizza, good service.  Not much more to say!!!

name: Robert Kennelly
text: Great pizza, salad and service, but the urinal in the men's room was filty and made me think about the lack of  attention to cleanliness.  Otherwise,  the restaurant would have gotten 5 stars

name: Fiona Taylor
text: Very good vegan pizza, great customer serviceüòä

name: Tim Ray
text: Wife liked the chicken salad sandwich, service was good,  I didn't like the calzone dough, though. Not much stuffing for a $12+ calzone either.

name: Randi Marie
text: Grace was absolutely wonderful. She was so attentive, friendly, and fast with EVERYTHING. I wish every waitress was like her. The food was also delicious and fresh. I loved everything!

name: Donna Adams
text: Just picked up a cold pizza they were cutting it when I got there.  Use to be my favorite place.

name: Nina Coe
text: Delicious but extremely expensive. We ordered to-go though. Maybe there's an upcharge for to-go orders. But the pizza was DELICIOUS.

name: Drewski dagu
text: Finally found my pizza üçï home. It was perfect.

name: william floyd
text: Great environment,  the pizza is a real treat and very delicious.. tried the hamburger, wings, and salad also while here.  All very good just remember to ask for your burger to be well down as it comes out medium well. The burger was very ‚Ä¶More

name: Carol Daniel
text:
We love to go there. The pizza is outstanding.
Italian sandwich great. Staff very nice and helpful. Would recommend to anyone.

name: Nancy McCrory
text: Always good & nice place to sit outside

name: Michael Hutchinson
text: The pizza is delicious  hear and the service was great. We asked for recommendations and the waiter was able to ask a few questions and offer suggestions based on our likes and dislikes. I would recommend this location to anyone.

name: Karen Lekan
text: I love the special pizza price on Mondays!

name: michael sherrer
text: It was great! Service is great. Clean. Following protocols. Excellent service!

name: Laura McClelland
text: This was our first time at this location.  We normally go to the one in Marietta and love it! The menu seemed a bit different but the food was just as good and our server was wonderful.

name: Cyndie Hoffman
text: Not good. We ordered through an app...door  dash, maybr? Cannot recall as my friend placed the order. Pizza arrived cold and, honestly, I don't know how people can call this pizza. The regular crust tastes like honey wheat bread which is pretty yucky with savory pizza toppings. I think I'll never eat at a MM again.

name: Kurt Fogelgren
text: I live around the corner and love the food here.  However, the owners of the place need to get their act together.  There are 3 TVs at the bar, two of them are set to the same channel for some unknown reason.  All of them require your ‚Ä¶More

name: John Ogden
text: Good food, good service, Hard to ask for more

name: Priyank Deshmukh
text: Unfortunately there is not an option of 4.5 otherwise I would have given them that. The food is great & the staff is friendly. Our only issue is that they sometime gives us the parmesan chesse but sometimes they completely forget to give us that.

name: Stephen Nelson
text: The storm knocked out the electricity and our order was not in the system. They worked fast to get it ready and it was delicious!

name: Mark Robinson
text: Service was good with friendly staff. Ordered the pretzels with salt and some with parmesan are they were delicious. We also got the spinach which was amazing. The pizza was great as well, but you should already know that. We will definitely be returning.

name: Craig Jones
text: Food and service were excellent.

name: Mony Coleman
text: Delicious food and great service. Perfect stop for lunch.

name: Kristin
text: Disappointed in the gluten free options. I know this place is primarily for people who aren‚Äôt gluten free, but if you offer a gluten free pizza I think you should try to make it taste good. I have had several gluten free pizzas at other ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Bowling
text: Loved it. Great hangout with great beer! Bartender was awesome and had a great personality! Before I took my last sip of beer he had another one in front of me!

name: Mahriah Grosh
text: I had the holy shiitake pizza and it was delicious!

name: Mia Westbrook
text: Great food if eating in house. Terrible if placing a to-go order. Two times I‚Äôve placed to go orders and the bruschetta and pizza were both chill when delivered. Also, I specifically asked for extra vinaigrette sauce for the bruschetta and ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Silva
text: Had to sit outside. Hot. You can sit at the bar inside, but that is it unless you sit outside.

name: Jeff Kern
text: I always get the Holy Shiitake and it never fails to be the best thing ever

name: Cory McClelland
text: Friendly employees, customizable calzones and great atmosphere! You can't leave hungry, unless you want too.

name: shannon moutainlion
text: Was here with a big group and the took care of us we were never thirsty and definitely full after

name: Joseph Jacklett
text: If you love mushrooms you must try their mushroom soup.

name: Winifred Gordon
text: Best pizza ever. Friendly service and great atmosphere!  Enjoyed the pizza so much

name: Miranda Thomason
text: Follow your heart vegan cheese! I eat at Mellow Mushroom frequently. This is a smaller one but they have covered outside dining. The waitress was very friendly and helpful. The food was great as always.

name: morgan hill
text: Great pizza. Wonderful service! My glass was never empty. Loved it

name: Stephen Brewer
text: The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The food was fresh and hot, and pretty tasty. The only thing I really didn't like was the paper straws, but our waitress noticed that and asked if we wanted plastic straws. I am glad she asked because I did not know if they still had plastic or not.

name: Chris Musson
text: The pizza was excellent. I would have given 5 stars, but i had to wait an additional 20 minutes after I was told my "to go" would be ready. ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Goff
text: The pizza and pretzel bites were great. The service was horrible. It was during a non-busy time on Saturday. The waiter brought our drinks. Then, he immediately walked away and ignored us the rest of the time. We had to beg the hostess for someone else to take our order and refill our drinks. We were shocked and won‚Äôt be returning.

name: Westy 427
text:
Thank you for doing your part in saving the environment with paper straws !!
Along with Awesome food and hospitality

name: Matt Woodruff
text: The food is good. I enjoy it. The atmosphere is good, but the seats in the booths need to be replaced. They are not in great shape at all.

name: not super cool V2
text: The host named Alexis was wonderful! I came in and left with a smile, and will continue to come to this location!

name: James Higginbotham
text: Always delicious

name: Gregory Garcia
text: Very good pizza! Awesome outdoor covered patio where you can bring your pooch and watch sports

name: Tekey Ringer
text: I just noticed this location and I love the service and the food.

name: Brian Misnuner
text: Great pizza, best I have had among all MM. Service was very good.

name: Shawn H
text: Great food, friendly service, and clean

name: William Warren-Aliff
text:
Took about 25 minutes to get my food.
When I did get it, it was meh. Just okay. Made me wonder why I paid $15 for a mediocre small pizza when  I could get a much better one for $8 at MOD.

name: Diana Luder
text: Never, ever order this pizza thru door dash delivery.  Pizza in restaurant is great.  Door dash ruins it!!

name: Tim Dorr
text: Great quality food. Service was decently speedy and attentive. Not the largest location, but doesn't appear to get too crowded. Also, it's a nice kid-friendly place for those with children with them.

name: Jen Reid
text: Cant get enough of this crust. Nom nom nom.

name: Geraldine Smith-Weatherspoon
text: Mellow Mushroom, can compete with any pizza that I've eaten their all meat Pizza is wonderful I do recommend it.  You will agree!

name: yvonne butler
text: My children and I love this place.

name: Charles Howard
text: Good pizza and salad, service was good too

name: Eddie B
text: Don't deserve a star period. we waited a hour for our food to come out. Server first said sorry for the delay had a issue with your order. Still didn't come out 35 mins. Server s then came back and said it would be in 4mins. Asked to speak ‚Ä¶More

name: Hugh Quigley
text: I never knew the Mellow Mushroom was in GA. It is a great place to eat and have some very good pizza.

name: Tona Tedford
text: We recently visited this place and my 14 year old loved it! He ate an entire pizza on Saturday night and another one on Sunday morning! Great service and reasonably priced.

name: Tiffany Johnson
text: The pizza was wonderful. The service was horrible! The waiter truly didn't care about his job. He continually forgot to get our drinks. It finally got so bad that my husband had to go to the bar to get us some water. Once another family showed up we were completely disregarded.

name: Krystal Floyd
text: After church, we decided to have lunch here. Part of our order was wrong and we had to wait for quite a while for our food. I will still visit mellow mushroom, but not this location. The food that was correct was really good, it was the service that was unimpressive

name: Cosandra Evan
text: YUM....YUM....YUM!!  I really like Mellow Mushroom's Chicken and Cheese (chicken philly).  Their pizza is also the bomb.....just wish they had likes some spicy chicken sausage OR turkey pepperoni....as toppings to select.   What I have tried....I've really liked.

name: Justin Wallace
text: Had a pretty decent experience my first time, but in an attempt to return for trivia again, we were greeted with mediocre service at best. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mary Beth Condon
text: Great food, lovely place.

name: Karen Kilpatrick
text: Service was quick and food was delicious.  Enjoyed a drink while waiting for our to-go order.  Cozy, fun, and delicious smells coming from the kitchen while we waited!

name: June Nwachukwu
text: Cool and cozy atmosphere with a friendly staff! We ordered a medium build your own and were served quickly

name: Joanie Luke
text: Fun place to go for great food! We had a party of 6 and our food was served fast and so fresh and tasty. Lots of choices of beer from which to choose. Their Calzones were perfect! Others had pizzas and wings. Yummy!

name: Keryn Marino
text: Unusual pairings of ingredients make this pizza stand out.  Try the Kosmic Karma pizza - Yum!

name: Blake Thomas
text: Always have a good time here for Thursday Night Drinking Club. Steve-o is the best, keeps the beers coming. Excellent Pizza and delicious Dough. Wonderful and friendly waitstaff as well.

name: Kelly Ante
text: Good service! Excellent food!

name: Mary Lanning
text:
Love the GF pizza here.
Wish the staff were better trained.  They took a phone order after I had asked for my pizza (called in earlier).  NOTHING makes me more angry with restaurant staff than "second come, first served".

name: Georgann Grady
text:
Great place. Good Food. Fantastic waitress.
Kanilla I think was her name. Always checking on us. Refilling our drinks. Fun personality.

name: Daniel Hooper
text: Best Mellow Mushroom I‚Äôve been to hands down. Every other one I‚Äôve been to they cook the crust just a little too much, and the service is kinda slow. But here, they were on top of it, and the crust was perfection(more than its usual ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Wood
text: Great pizza and the pretzels with parmesan cheese and marinara dipping sauce are a must. Good selection of beer as well.

name: Tiffany L
text: A solid place to eat, service and food consistently satisfactory.

name: Mallory Thalman
text: The food was good. But the price is over the top. And this location was very rundown.

name: Shivam Sharma
text: Delicious vegan sandwich. Several options for Vegans/vegetarians. Really doing a great job ;) ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom Stewart
text: Would love to know what it tastes like but when you wait for a table and find out the hostess on 14 March 2019 took our name off the list for no apparent reason. Then, refused to add us except at the bottom we didn't feel welcomed enough ‚Ä¶More

name: Luc Guglielmi
text: I just went yesterday for a business lunch meeting at 1pm. I highly recommend this place. I was a little afraid to have a business lunch meeting on Friday (afraid of the noise, etc.) but actually it was quiet enough that we could hear each ‚Ä¶More

name: Peter Yacavone
text: Love this place! Great beer selection and food quality is always top notch. Very fun environment. They also will occasionally have live music on weekends. Sometimes it gets a little loud because it is indoors, but overall I will continue to go back.

name: Tony McCarthy
text: Best pizza in metro Atlanta. Consistently good for over 20 years.

name: Natascha Lema
text: The beer cheese is very delicious. The pizza was well made and great sized portions. However for a to go order we waited for over 25 minutes and the service it self while we waited was not the best.

name: Hayden Patton
text: Mellow mushroom is always one of my favorites and this location was as good as others. I recommend the jerk chicken if you haven't had it at mellow mushroom before as it is the bomb.

name: Kayla Hensley
text: Love this place! Always great food and customer service, not to mention the great management! I would highly recommend for parties and catering.

name: Amanda Blackwell
text: This is the most consistent restaurant I have ever been to. I live super close and am here multiple times a week (My boyfriend thinks I'm crazy). Molly and Tara are my favorite, but everyone is super nice and accommodating! I can't say ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith Lyons
text: Great good and local craft beer for cheap,  get a pitcher for the best deal.

name: Yolanda Barrett
text: The staff, food and atmosphere were great. I'm real finicky about restaurants because any time I get a little extra money,  it's usually only enought to treat myself to a meal out somewhere. Katie, we watched you serve  tables and the bar ‚Ä¶More

name: Tommy Kraus
text: Good food, great staff, great atmosphere

name: Ken Christians
text: If you want the best service, tastiest food, and coldest beer on tap in Kennesaw, look no further! I‚Äôve never experienced a more friendly, professional staff in a restaurant/bar environment than here!

name: Jazmine McIntyre
text: This location is up to par when it comes to service. The first time I came, pizza was phenomenal. So of course I came back. However, today I had a hiccup with something I ordered. They went above and beyond to correct the issue. The prices ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Geho
text: One of my favorite stops to pickup a solid vegan pizza. Great cocktails and even better workers. Glad to have been a part of the family for awhile!

name: Cody Cook
text: First time ever at mellow mushroom. I give a 2 star rating not only for the terrible food, but also for the terrible service. We had a party of 7. Waited for over an hour on our main course. waited 20 minutes for the "pretzel bites," which ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason H
text: Well managed, the staff cares and it's very noticeable. Never a bad experience

name: Shanon Seals
text: Consistently THE best pizza.  The best, most flavorful ingredients, the best crust.  Doesn't matter which store, every one I have been to has been great even the few I have been to outside of Georgia.  They all have very interesting and unique decor, fitting the Mellow Mushroom theme.  Good selection of beers on tap.

name: Christopher Byers
text: My favorite pizza. Mmm...mm..  Price is high. But like the food. The pizza is really delicious but priced way to high

name: Tayo Daniel's sr
text: Very very good. The vegetables pizza is excellent.

name: Stuxnet Cabal
text: Good gluten free pizza. Though this place would be better if they served marijuana

name: Doug Dagostino
text: Extremely creative tasty pizzas with a nice variety of other foods and a good selection of beverages.  This is not a discount pizzeria but if you like quality you will not be disappointed.

name: Josh Porter
text: Great pizza, fun atmosphere

name: Rebekah Wells
text:
Wonderful staff, everyone was very nice and helpful. Sat at the bar and had a beer while I waited for my to-go order.
They brought my order out and showed me the pizzas to make sure they were right.

name: Scott Lemke
text: Our favorite dinner spot when traveling to and from Florida!!!

name: Phyllis Mooneyham
text: Brucestta bread very soggy, chicken wings very good. Chicken salad would have been excellent had the mayo been reduced by half, but roasted potatoes were very tasty.  Wait staff was great.

name: Yoana Lopez
text: Waited for a lil. salad 25 min. When I asked about my order, they realize they did not have it done. It was a to go order. My salad does not look close  to what they have in the pictures

name: Pika Gamergirl16
text: Service was great and the food was delicious

name: Tress Ritter
text: The holy shiitake pie is the best. The staff is always friendly and great here. I love the Chastain location.

name: Brooklyn Simmons
text: My favorite pizza place in the South! Always order a white pizza and they allow to substitute a ranch base (if you like ranch you MUST try). The staff is always very helpful as well!! Delicious and fresh every time.

name: Juan Alma
text: Fantastic pizza and cold beer, burgers are also really good!!

name: Rhonda Gresham
text: Food was awesome and our server Alex was amazing!!! üòÅ

name: Mark Cornelius
text: Awesome pizza and great staff

name: Faith Langevin
text: Excellent food and service!  Check online for other mellow mushroom local pizzas (my favorite is the Marley from the Conyers location) and they‚Äôll make it at any Mellow location. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Lanning
text: Great food and service! Entire staff is awesome as well!

name: Dusty
text: Horrible service. Our server forgot that we were there many times, and it was not busy or crowded! We waited about an hour before he remembered to put our order in. He only brought my drink, not my wife's, I had to get that one myself. We will not be returning.

name: Andriel Jones
text: Totally groovy pizza, but I wouldn't recommend other dishes. Maybe in comparison to the pizza everything else seems subpar, but you still won't be disappointed with the pizza and environment. Definitely a favorite of mine. The Kosmic Karma pizza is one to try for sure!

name: Thomas Barrow
text: Great place to eat vary good food and friendly staff

name: Jay Jay
text: The best Capri salad I've had in a restaurant in years. The balsamic dressing was to die for. Super fresh and delicious.  It was busy, so we sat at the bar & the bartenders were a dynamic duo. Great food, great service.

name: Tammy Gearl
text: Service was great food was really good. Freezing but we asked them to turn fans off and they did. Decent music.

name: Tanner Johnson
text: My parents wouldn't let me have beer dip with the pretzel bites... you guys should have an alternate dip for kids as in regular cheese dip. All I tasted in the pretzel bites was garlic, it would be nice if you didn't put so much garlic on ‚Ä¶More

name: Kenneth Heard
text: Food great service was great!

name: Allora Studios
text: The food and atmosphere here are great.

name: Virginia Wood
text: best greek salad I've had in ages, and great service.

name: Pies-On Pizza
text: Kayla rocks we had a awesome time good food, great service and clean restrooms just what we needed after driving for 8 hours ...

name: James Ansari
text:
I've never had a bad meal here!!!
I had pizza, burgers and a cheese steak sandwich. Great customer service!!!...keep on shroomin'!!

name: Marilyn Thomas
text: Great service & drinks at the bar!

name: Patrick F
text: Always great food, service and atmosphere.

name: Thalia Dooley
text: The food was great. Service excellent

name: Kenia Lopez
text: Always love mellow mushroom.  Great experience at this location.

name: Doug Silva
text: Slow service, appetizer Spinch Dip was cold. Still waiting on main course. Finally got the main meal, had a Chef Salad and a bowl of the Cream of Mushroom Soup. Salad was good, but again something that should be hot, like the soup was cold. My  wife's pizza was good, and it was hot.

name: Sean Burdge
text:
Great pizza and a good place
to watch the game

name: Joshua Good
text: Nine members of my family ate at this restaurant on the patio during a tornado warning and the staff got us a table inside. The storm knocked out the power,  but our food still came out on time once the power was restored. The food was ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonathan Griffith
text: AK & Brooke were awesome! My cousin and i took our dog here this afternoon and the food was great, they were dog friendly and genuinely sweet. Thanks ladies, if we're ever in the area again we'll make sure to get your section.

name: Dan Orchard
text:
Good food and timely, thoughtful service from Katie!
Good beer choices, highly recommended.

name: Chris Donadio
text: The hostest was gracious and my server, Jimmy, was on the spot with everything. The food was great tasting (especially the garlic parmesan pretzel knots) and the atmosphere comfortable. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Hebert
text: Awesome place  cant go wrong been traveling to kennasaw area for past 18 yrs I always stop there ..I am only there 1 week every year  must stop...

name: Daniela M Ribeiro Beard
text: Went in for trivia. We had called beforehand and were told no reservations were needed as the place didn't get too busy. Got there only to have no seats left. The servers were kind and set up a couple extra tables after we stood for 15 ‚Ä¶More

name: Isaac James
text: Quite a wait for the food. But it was delicious and filling once we got it. The mushroom pizza and avocado sub were a hit.

name: Chynna Fitzgerald
text: Food was good and service as well.

name: L H
text: Overall the pizza, other food and service here is excellent.  However there are some pizza orders that are inconsistent in quality.  Most likely a training issue.

name: Vince O
text: Good food and good service.

name: M Purenne
text: I would love to give this restaurant 5 stars because even though my food was not up to par my server was amazing! This was my families first time at Mellow Mushroom and although our wait was long the kitchen just could not get our order ‚Ä¶More

name: ryan boone
text: The best pizza anywhere! Hands down.. I'm a pizza critic and eat at allot places in and around Atlanta.

name: Nereida Baez
text: Worse pizza in all my life

name: Captain Jocassee
text: Jesse Ryan, AKA #1 Mellow mushroom fan, did an amazing job preparing and baking our pizza and calzones. Service was great as we were greeted with a smile. Our waitress made sure my sweet tea was never below half-full. HIGHLY recommended.

name: Daniel Dobry III
text: Clean location with a friendly staff. Food comes out quick and tasty.

name: Randy Stewart
text: The food is great, but the kitchen is never staffed appropriately. On our 2 experiences there, they had the same issues. This last visit was a 45 minute wait for food that was wrong and had to be sent back. They definitely need new management.

name: Christian V
text: Tasty food and fun atmosphere. The fact that this location also has some of my favorite local choices (specialty menu items) makes it a bit easier for me to give it five stars.

name: Marilyn D Harbin
text: Every time I eat here the waitresses do everything they can to ensure you have a great experience.  I love the salads

name: Chang Beal
text: The most delicious pizza simple and wonderful. Still on of my favorite pizza places.

name: Wild Angel
text: The pizza is awesome and our waiter Josh was the best waiter ever. He was managing tables and the bar. ü§óü§óü§óü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©

name: Dave Lahood
text: Good pizza but very skimpy on the toppings. Not worth the price

name: Brian Kozyra
text: The pizza was great and the staff are very friendly.  It seemed life a great place to get some food and have a few drinks.

name: Brandy Michelle
text: It's always crazy busy.  I typically do to go orders because of that.  The dough is amazing on it's own.  I love the calzones.

name: Melanie Rose
text: Love the MM. Josh was awesome, professional and suggested the Magic Mushroom Soup and Brutus Salad...STELLAR.

name: Tom Kirchhofer
text: Wait staff seemed really disinterested in serving us.  Grandkids took us to lunch for "Grandparents Day" and one grandkid didn't get what he ordered; one Grandparent wasn't served his pizza until it was time to leave.   The bill was adjusted but it didn't make up for being ignored by servers.

name: Anneke Pronk
text: Def the best place to build your own vegan za

name: Incognito Burrito
text: This is the worst mellow mushroom I've ever been to. The salad was old, limp and brown and the mushrooms... literally the mushrooms were dark and beginning to slime. I do not recommend this location.

name: Hannah Greer
text: Don't love Mellow Mushroom's pizza...it's just a little "bready" but otherwise it's a cool place.

name: Maria L. dos Santos
text: At this location was take out. Pizza Supreme it was excellent. Looking forward to dine in.

name: Nate Smith
text: Pizza and pretzal was great

name: Brittany Mitchell
text: Favorite pizza place ever!!!

name: Perry Lamb
text: Great staff, really yummy pizza and for an excellent price

name: T Flow
text: Service excellent Food awful. I've been to Mellow 3 different times in 3 different States and each experience been the same. What is that meat they use? Yuk!!!!

name: Austin Arvidson
text: Some of the best pizza in Kennesaw. If you are coming here on a weekend night be prepared to wait because it is a rather small place. However the wait is always worth it at Mellow

name: John Kaminski
text: The pizza was great when we got it.  We seen 5 other tables get their pizza that sat and ordered after we did.  Service is why I only gave this 4 stars.

name: William Cottle
text: Great pizza as usual

name: Zachary Wagner
text: Love this place. Great food, good service... It's been remodeled since I was last in and feels much larger now.

name: Sky Green
text: aMmMazing...

name: David Snyder
text: The pizza was good and the trivia was fun!

name: Rebecca Curtis
text: Service was great but music was too loud.

name: Dan Doyle
text: Great pizza and a good beer selection.

name: Brittany Jensen
text: Fast service and great pizza

name: Reece LeFevre
text: Younger college crowd but service and food were excellent. Fun time.

name: Beth Mcvicker
text: Great staff and the food is delicious!

name: Hensley Boswell
text: Great atmosphere to kick back and have a beer and some pizza after work. I really enjoyed my experience and the staff was very friendly. Would come back again

name: Robby Lotspeich
text: I believe this was the location that catered for the 2018 Owl-O-Ween. If so, I hope this review finds management. Not only was the pizza on point, the service made my experience at the festival unforgettable!

name: Amanda Pham
text: Great pizza and quick service.

name: Faye Henderson
text: Great pizza Slow service

name: Tom Warden
text: Had a sausage,pepperoni medium pizza. The crust was nice and crisp, great pizza, great service, cool atmosphere.

name: Robert S
text: I had the Magical Mystery Tour Pizza w/ sausage and a Dry County IPA (my favorite) and both were excellent.   My wife had the Caesar salad and loved it.  The wait staff was extremely friendly and attentive.   If you are looking for good food and a fun atmosphere the Kennesaw Mellow Mushroom is the place to go.
